title: Velocity and acceleration of ball at highest pt

content.question: A ball is kicked from the ground with an initial speed v0 at an angle θ above the horizontal. Which of the following best describes the magnitudes of the velocity and acceleration of the ball when it reaches the highest point of its trajectory?

topic.text: 1.5: Motion in Two or Three Dimensions

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
